title: Won't let me create a club tag
body: I want to create a tag for my club but it seems I'm unable to. Call me stupid or whatever but I'm seriously not seeing how to do this. {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body: When you go into your Profile -> Clubs, you should see a gear icon in the upper right corner under the Summoner Search. Click that, then you should be able to set the tag.
Yeah, I tried that before and it doesn't do anything.
